SELECT BASE_DATE AS xAxis, CHNL_LCLS_NM AS series, CHN_CNT AS seriesValue FROM ( SELECT X.CHNL_LCLS_NM, X.BASE_DATE, NVL(Y.CHN_CNT, 0) AS CHN_CNT FROM ( SELECT Y.CHNL_LCLS_CD, Y.CHNL_LCLS_NM, X.NO, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - NO, 'YYYYMMDD') AS BASE_DATE FROM BIG_TPC_NO X, BIG_LCLS_CHNL Y WHERE Y.CHNL_LCLS_CD = #{chnlCd}
) X, ( SELECT Y.CHNL_LCLS_CD, Y.BASE_DATE, COUNT(X.CLC_DOC_NUM) AS CHN_CNT FROM BIG_TPC_TXT_ANAL X, BIG_TPC_RST Y, BIG_TPC_MST M WHERE X.CLC_DOC_NUM = Y.CLC_DOC_NUM AND Y.ASK_NUM = M.ASK_NUM AND X.WRD_NM = #{keyword} AND Y.BASE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND M.CUST_ID = #{custId} AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY Y.CHNL_LCLS_CD, Y.BASE_DATE ) Y WHERE X.BASE_DATE = Y.BASE_DATE(+) AND X.CHNL_LCLS_CD = Y.CHNL_LCLS_CD(+) ) WHERE BASE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY BASE_DATE, CHNL_LCLS_NM
